messages.content: FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How can the faculty pay the semester fee for a student?

Faculty can pay the semester fee by extracting a list of students who haven't paid from FS, preparing an Excel sheet with their details, and sending it along with an internal invoice to the accounting department. Ensure to include both the semester fee and the SAIH fee if applicable.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
What are the requirements for a new FS password?
A new FS password must be at least 12 characters long. When creating a new password, ensure it meets the complexity requirements detailed in the FS password change window.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
Where can I find a list of all FS hotkeys?

A complete list of FS hotkeys, including shortcuts for search, registration, and navigation, can be found in our FS help documentation. This includes Ctrl+F for search, Ctrl+R for registration mode, and many more.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I update course information in FS?

To update course information in FS, access the course in the Emneplanlegger p√• nett (EpN), make the necessary changes under each tab, and ensure to save your progress. Notify the FS team once updates are complete.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How does a student request a refund for the semester fee?

Students who have already paid the semester fee but are eligible for a refund due to faculty payment should be directed to apply for a refund through the UIA website. They must mention that the semester fee will be paid via the faculty and provide necessary documentation.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How can I enable notifications for FS updates?

To enable notifications for FS updates, go to your profile settings within FS and look for the 'Notifications' section. Here, you can customize which updates you receive notifications for and select your preferred method of notification.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How can I view my academic progress in FS?

Your academic progress can be viewed in FS under the 'Academic Progress' section of your student profile. This includes completed courses, grades, and any degree requirements you have fulfilled. For a detailed breakdown or assistance, please consult the FS user guide.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I submit assignments in FS?

To submit assignments in FS, navigate to the specific course page and look for the 'Assignments' section. There, you will find instructions for submitting your work, including any relevant deadlines and submission formats. If you encounter difficulties, reach out to your instructor for guidance.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How do I request an academic transcript in FS?

Academic transcripts can be requested through FS by navigating to the 'Documents' or 'Academic Records' section of your profile. Follow the prompts to request your transcript, specifying the format and delivery method you prefer. For any issues, contact the registrar's office.
FS-Assistent is a support chatbot for FS UIA.
How can I update my personal information in FS?

To update your personal information in FS, access the 'Personal Information' section of your profile. Here, you can edit details such as contact information and emergency contacts. Ensure to save your changes and contact support if you experience any issues.
